profiles.name: General Transcription
profiles.description: Standard transcription profile for general use
profiles.prompt: Please transcribe the following audio accurately, maintaining natural punctuation and formatting.

profiles.name: Medical Transcription
profiles.description: Specialized profile for medical terminology and formatting
profiles.prompt: Transcribe medical audio with proper medical terminology, maintaining professional formatting and accuracy.
profiles.example_input: Patient presents with acute myocardial infarction
profiles.example_output: Patient presents with acute myocardial infarction.

profiles.name: Legal Transcription
profiles.description: Profile optimized for legal terminology and formal language
profiles.prompt: Transcribe legal proceedings with formal language, proper legal terminology, and accurate punctuation.
